span.span: A Public School serving the East Bay & Tri-Valley Communities of the Greater Bay Area

a.span: API Reports at the Calif. Dept of Education

span.span: Governing Board Virtual Mtg Agenda - April 21, 2020 - Click Here

Sunol Glen School, located in Sunol (CA), is a public K-8 school. We are a unique school in that we are a one-school, school-district. Our staff prides itself on utilizing the latest technology, best teaching practices, and optimum learning environment for all students. As a small rural school, we depend on inter-district transfers and families to choose us from nearby communities.

A part of our school's appeal to our neighbors is our ability to maintain small class sizes; include enriching curriculum in Art, Music and Band; and up-to-date skills in Keyboarding, Computers, and Technology.
To avoid two main issues that most other schools struggle with – transient enrollment and limited technology/technology awareness – our staff has developed two signature practices :

span.br: Students are placed in multi-age classrooms and work as a team. Age is unimportant; skill and need drive the classroom and learning.

span.span: Students work in centers or with partners and build upon past knowledge at a level that is appropriate, regardless of age.
We currently have a fully utilized computer classroom with 34 workstations and five laptop carts on campus that are shared between classroom pairs. We are a
site and working to embed technology into our classrooms in all subject matter.

div.p: We encourage students to show Kindness at All Times. Just one more reason why Sunol Glen is outstanding!

span.span: Distance Learning, Sunol Glen Unified School District has provided Chromebooks to its students as needed; the photo below shows a picture of our tech team working at the second drive-through distribution that helped connect students to devices.
